msection.title: Description
msection.p: The svnant implementation provides some conditions which allow to check for some repository states so actions can be selectively performed.

msection.title: Parameters
msection.p: The following list of attributes is shared among all condition implementations:

attribute.name: username
attribute.doc: username that will be used for all nested svn commands.

doc.b: Deprecated. This attribute won't work with SVNANT 1.3.2+ . Use refid for svnSetting instead.

attribute.name: password
attribute.doc: password that will be used for all nested svn commands.

doc.b: Deprecated. This attribute won't work with SVNANT 1.3.2+ . Use refid for svnSetting instead.

attribute.name: javahl
attribute.doc: Set to "false" to use command line client interface instead of JNI JavaHL binding.

doc.b: Deprecated. This attribute won't work with SVNANT 1.3.2+ . Use refid for svnSetting instead.

attribute.name: svnkit
attribute.doc: Set to "false" to use command line client interface instead of SVNKit binding.

doc.b: Deprecated. This attribute won't work with SVNANT 1.3.2+ . Use refid for svnSetting instead.

attribute.name: failonerror
attribute.doc: Controls whether an error stops the build or is merely reported to the screen.

doc.b: Deprecated. This attribute won't work with SVNANT 1.3.2+ . Use refid for svnSetting instead.

attribute.name: refid
attribute.doc: If set the configuration for this task is taken from a svnSetting object. Such a settings instance simply provides default values, so they will be overridden in case the corresponding attribute on this task has been set.
